title: Make your senate vote count
brief_description: Bill Peach of ABC’s “This Day Tonight” explains how to vote correctly in a Senate election. In the last Senate election nearly half a million informal votes out of a possible 6 million, were cast and could not be counted. Tells the five simple steps to avoid mistakes.
